to take care (of)/to control/to manage/to be in charge of/to look after/to run/to care about/tube/pipe/woodwind/classifier for tube-shaped objects/particle similar to 把[ba3] in 管...叫 constructions/writing brush/(coll.) to/towards

sentences.english: Objective To summarize the clinical characteristics and treatment options of cutaneous vessel abnormalities.
sentences.chinese: 目的总结儿童皮肤脉管异常的临床特点和治疗选择。

sentences.english: The vasculature of the dermis is particularly well developed at sites of adnexal structures.
sentences.chinese: 皮肤附属器部的真皮脉管尤其发达。

sentences.english: Treatment of thromboangiitis obliterans with good results.
sentences.chinese: 治疗血栓闭塞性脉管炎取得良好效果。

sentences.english: Conclusions Adenomatoid tumors are not very rare in uterus. The main pattern of them is canalicular type.
sentences.chinese: 结论子宫腺瘤样瘤不少见，主要类型是脉管型。

sentences.english: The retinal vasculature in the parafoveal region was assessed.
sentences.chinese: 同时评估旁中心凹区域的视网膜脉管系统。

sentences.english: The system uses a pulse-tube mechanical cryocooler, eliminating the need for liquid cryogens .
sentences.chinese: 该系统使用脉管式机械冷却器，无需液体制冷剂。

sentences.english: Serologic evidence of a systemic vasculitis was present in 50% of patients.
sentences.chinese: 的患者有系统性脉管炎的血清学表现。

sentences.english: An azured harebell like her veins.
sentences.chinese: 像她的脉管一样蓝的风信子。

sentences.english: Fine vascular pattern, such as ox hair was twisted filaments.
sentences.chinese: 脉管纹极细，呈绞丝状如牛毛。

sentences.english: The vascular water in loess is difficultly located for small scale in northwest China.
sentences.chinese: 西北地区黄土层中的脉管水规模较小，定位困难。

definition: (in Chinese medicine) stasis (of blood or other fluids)
